alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Charles City; Chesterfield; City of Colonial Heights; City of Hopewell; City of Petersburg; City of Richmond; Dinwiddie; Greensville; Henrico; New Kent; Prince George; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 18 at 2:36AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, south central, and southeast Virginia, including the following counties and independent cities, in central Virginia, Chesterfield, City of Colonial Heights, City of Richmond and Henrico. In east central Virginia, Charles City and New Kent. In south central Virginia, Brunswick, City of Hopewell, City of Petersburg, Dinwiddie and Prince George. In southeast Virginia, Greensville and Sussex. * WHEN...Until 545 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 234 AM EDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts around 0.5 to locally up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Richmond, Petersburg, Dinwiddie, Hopewell, Colonial Heights, Virginia State University, Fort Gregg-Adams, Chester, Purdy, Highland Springs, Roxbury, Talleysville, Prince George, Jarratt, Stony Creek, Matoaca, Ettrick, Carson, Sutherland and Bellwood. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Brunswick; Charles City; Chesterfield; City of Colonial Heights; City of Hopewell; City of Petersburg; City of Richmond; Dinwiddie; Greensville; Henrico; New Kent; Prince George; Sussex
